Offer Terms. These terms and conditions detail the Black Friday Preview offer. Qualified bookings will be eligible for a certain percentage off of the voyage fare for a second person traveling in company, plus a free “Bar Tab” per cabin, in varying amounts depending on the length of voyage; see the “Promotional Bar Tab” section below. Base, Essential and Premium fare bookings are eligible for this promotion. 1.1 Buy One Fare Get a Second Fare 80% off.” Under the Black Friday offer through 04 December 2025, Virgin Voyages will provide a total discount of 40% off both Sailor 1 and Sailor 2 retail (base) voyage fares when two (2) Sailors book a voyage to sail together in an Eligible Cabin (see section 3.1 for Eligible Cabins) Additionally, if there are four (4) Sailors traveling together in one cabin, all four (4) Sailors will receive 40% off their Voyage Fare. Eligible cabins are listed in section 3.1. Promotional Bar Tab (Per Cabin): Voyage Length: 10+ Night Sailings Meta Category Bar Tab Total Amount ● Rockstar Suites: $400 ● Sea Terrace: $200 Voyage Length: 6- 9 Night Sailings Meta Category Bar Tab Total Amount ● Rockstar Suites: $300 ● Sea Terrace: $150 Voyage Length: 4 - 5 Night Sailings Meta Category Bar Tab Total Amount ● Rockstar Suites: $100 ● Sea Terrace: $50 2. Eligible Bookings Eligible bookings are those purchased for an eligible cabin (see section 3.1) for an eligible voyage date between 12:00:01 a.m. local US east coast time on 31 October 2025 through 11:59:59 p.m. local US east coast time on 04 December 2025. Eligible voyage dates are any voyage open for sale on non-charter, open, revenue voyages. 3.Restrictions/Exclusions. The Black Friday Preview Offer is subject to the following restrictions and exclusions. 3.1 Eligible Cabins, Percentage Off: Only cabins in the Sea Terrace Meta Category cabins, The Sea View, Lock It In Rate Sea View, The Insider, and Lock It In Rate insider cabins are eligible for the percentage off in the Black Friday Preview Offer. The Sea Terrace Meta Category includes the following cabins: XL Sea Terrace, Central Sea Terrace, The Sea Terrace, Sea Terrace Slightly Smaller Balcony, Ltd View Sea Terrace, and the Lock It In Rate Ltd View Sea Terrace. This offer excludes the Solo Sea View and Solo Insider cabins. The Sailors to whom the two bookings apply must travel in the same cabin 3.2 Eligible Cabins, Bar Tab: Only cabins in the Rockstar Suite category and select Sea Terrace Meta Category cabins are eligible for the Bar Tab in the Black Friday Preview Offer The select Sea Terrace Meta Category includes the following cabins: XL Sea Terrace, Central Sea Terrace, The Sea Terrace, Sea Terrace Slightly Smaller Balcony, Ltd View Sea Terrace. The select Rockstar Suite Meta cabins, which include: Brilliant Suite, Cheeky Corner Suite - Biggest Terrace, Cheeky Corner Suite - Even Bigger Terrace, Cheeky Corner Suite - Pretty Big Terrace, Seriously Suite, Sweet Aft Suite - Biggest Terrace, Sweet Aft Suite - Even Bigger Terrace, Sweet Aft Suite - Pretty Big Terrace. The Bar Tab does not apply to the following cabins: all Lock It In Rate cabins, Mega Rockstar Suites, Sea View and Insider Meta Cabin Categories. Base, Essential and Premium fare bookings are eligible for this promotion. 3.3 Charter voyages are excluded from the Black Friday Preview Offer. 3.4 The Black Friday Preview Offer is combinable with the following offers, promotions, discounts, or credits: My Next Virgin Voyage Offer, Resident Rates (Florida, Georgia, Puerto Rico, Canada, Northeast), Military and First Responders Rates Offer, Pay In Full Offer, Groups and Circle Programs, Loyalty Offer (earning and redeeming) and Tour Operators. The Black Friday Preview Offer is not combinable with any other offers, promotions, discounts, or credits. Offer and combinability with other promotional. offers are subject to change at any time per Virgin Voyages’ discretion. Other restrictions may apply. 4. Virgin Voyages’ cancellation policies apply.
